website_summaries.verdict: The LG Optimus G for Sprint is the fastest Android phone today, but it isn't the best Android phone on Sprint.

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone but one hairline crack and screen shatters, renders device completely unusable
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic features, user friendly, great camera, but in my experience if an LG screen suffers a crack of any kind the entire phone is rendered unusable
customer_reviews.author: Vella

customer_reviews.title: If the camera were good, it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great except the camera, which is truly awful. I'm a decent photographer, know my way around camera settings, and take photos daily (with a real camera) as part of my business. This phone's camera is the pits. Refuses to focus. Have missed so many shots, it's maddening.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Great SOLID phone
customer_reviews.text: Great SOLID phone. Plays video games and runs apps very well. 8/10. Camera is solid. 7/10. The processor and operating system are very solid as well we're looking at an 8/10. Overall, a decent phone that runs great and meets all your basic needs.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for the price
customer_reviews.text: Phone came looking 100% new, i have some problems with 3/4g sometimes but quickly reconnects. Sometimes i have to turn data off then back on to connect to 4g when driving to new places. But thats fast and easy. All my problems are LG related. Family member with different phone do not have the same problems. The internet works once connected but needs to be reset when switching towers. Battery life is good, wishit had a sd slot but 32gig is fine. Overall i like the phone foe the price(130).
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: I broke my screen on my iPhone 5c and didn't want to pay more than I paid for the phone to fix the screen so I made the switch from apple to android. It was a Great decision. I really like this phone. Pros: nice size, Great definition to the screen, nice overall look, great customization. Cons: screen isn't so good in the sun and is kind of glossy, tinny speaker, camera isn't so Great, outdated Bluetooth and doesn't work with some Bluetooth devices like fitbit or Jawbone up24. Outdated android and they don't know when/if this device will update to kit kat or lollipop. Other than that It's Great.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T.

customer_reviews.title: Said it was a Sprint phone and it wasn't. ...
customer_reviews.text: Said it was a Sprint phone and it wasn't. Went to the Sprint store, and ended up having to buy new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it came missing pieces, power button & volume/up & ...
customer_reviews.text: it came missing pieces, power button & volume/up & down buttons, so I'm sending it back, I hope I do not run into problems
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie G.

customer_reviews.title: POOR RATING JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Less than 8 days the phone blew up from the inside out and the a replacement cost me 150.00 dollars. When I contact you Amazon you said turn it into the insurance company. I felt you should replace it with only 8 days use. I will watch what I buy from now on.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a beast! Best specs out there. Nothing can slow this puppy down. Everything is so fast and smooth. Just hope for jellybean update to 4.2 or 4.3.
customer_reviews.author: LocalJ12

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! Definetly met my expectations and more. So many features just in the camera alone!! You'll love it and what it offers
customer_reviews.author: DavidH

customer_reviews.title: LG 960 defect
customer_reviews.text: The phones speaker makes a high pitched sound every once in a while. Only way to shut it off is to turn on the recorder or turn off the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWEEESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Gold in my hands I got gold in my hands quad core processor check!!!!! I love this F@ckin phone STRAIGHT G.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: It was time to upgrade but I did not have extra funds for a Samsung or HTC One like I wanted. At .01 I couldn't pass this up and didn't expect much but this great little phone as exceeded my expectations. It is fast, easy to read screen, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Boyne III

customer_reviews.title: New king of phones.  Do not hesitate to pick up
customer_reviews.text: Masterpiece of a phone! Phone exceeds all expectations. LG nailed it. If trying to choose between s4 and g2 go with g2. I have both and it's really not even close.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints, Great Phone.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use touch screen. Internet pages look great. Gets great service for my area (sprint), much better than the last phone I had. Thinking about getting a second one for my spouse, who keeps stealing it from me.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Meggitt

customer_reviews.title: Almost there
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone would give it five stars but the glass is to easily scratched and doesn't offer accounts setup when first starting the phone
customer_reviews.author: Lashanos Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone!
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these for my sons - now Mom is jealous!! They are happy campers & I'm thinking of getting this phone next time I'm due!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: but a great phone
customer_reviews.text: Can get hot after extended use, but a great phone overall
customer_reviews.author: semiflan

customer_reviews.title: It's GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I love it I Love It Did i tell you that i love it ooop its great. Thanks !!!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: william wagaman

customer_reviews.title: LG Optimus G
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. Better than all expectations. Super fact quad-core processor allows you run multiple apps. HD camera with 13mp.
customer_reviews.author: Dabaddseed

customer_reviews.title: LG
customer_reviews.text: The phone did not have a clean ESN number has to return for a full refund. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Margo R.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was bigger than I realized so I ordered a different LG phone
customer_reviews.author: Velda Derricotte

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: wasn't aware that the phone wasn't using a sim card
customer_reviews.author: genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Underrated phone
customer_reviews.text: It's a year old now which is old hat in the technology industry but this phone's been doing great for the six months or so I've had it. It's got a pretty display and really solid battery life. I didn't like the LG skins so I downloaded the free Nova Launcher I think it's called, which uses Google's standard holo aesthetic. However the lock screen animations are pretty so I left those untouched. All in all a solid phone -- and I got it for $300 less than people upgrading their iPhones, so that's that.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie C

customer_reviews.title: LG comes in a simple package, but what a punch it delivers inside.
customer_reviews.text: Quite simply, what does this phone not do? the answer is...everything you need a phone to do, and more. the display is bright, Google is alive, and the quality is high. The best phone i have every owned!
customer_reviews.author: Little Groove

customer_reviews.title: LG Rocks!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the features on this phone and use most of quite a bit. I also recommended this phone to a friend that has been challenged by technology is the past but seems to have gotten the hang of his new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Returned it!
customer_reviews.text: With phone turned all the way up and my stereo in car turned all the way up I could barely hear music. I tried several different cords and it even does the same thing with headphones. Maybe I received a defective device, but as someone who uses their phone a lot for music I was very disappointed. Other than that the phone looks good and functioned well. I ended up getting the HTC ONE and like it a lot better though.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Still working great! It's a much better phone than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present. Still working great! It's a much better phone than I expected! Would very highly recommend! Thanks Seller!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Optimus G= Great
customer_reviews.text: Phone is fast, screen is beautiful and the battery is better than the galaxy phone I have. Signal is also better on this phone than my Samsung phones. Overall a good device.
customer_reviews.author: jessie rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fast phone with good reception.
customer_reviews.text: Fast, underrated phone plus I got it for a penny! This is basically an LG G2 it has most of the specs and the screen is super bright. The only thing I wished it had was an sd card expansion slot.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalShopper

customer_reviews.title: Love my phone
customer_reviews.text: I really am enjoying my phone. The only thing I don't like about it is that when you turn off the wifi and the phone is in an area that has wifi it turns back on. Besides that it does everything I want it to do. Would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hardin

customer_reviews.title: love new cell phone
customer_reviews.text: I am still learning features on my new cell phone. Overall it is a great product to use. Love the camera with the flash.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: The condition of the phone was better than expected and it has performed well
customer_reviews.text: The condition of the phone was better than expected and it has performed well. Glad i made the purchase for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Haake

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone, my husband is very happy to be the recipient of this phone like mine. It's quick on uploads and the battery lasts a good time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lumley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is amazing. I love it. Best kept secret in smart phones. Great graphics and tons of memory all in a sleek design.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: i love it - natalie nature
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I couldn't have gotten a better phone online!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a gift for my son and he loves it so far. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Dan Adair

customer_reviews.title: Cellphone
customer_reviews.text: I loved this cellphone for the cost and features that paid for a few months ago. I recommended my girl friend to purchased one too.
customer_reviews.author: Garvin L Harris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: i love it. its fast and can do tons of stuff on it. the only drawback is you cant take the battery out, so if something happens to it there goes the whole phone. but i'm loving the 13mp camera to!
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Fast!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo fast, my old Evo seems like a dinosaur. No lag time, great screen, thin and sharp. Definitely worth consideration!
customer_reviews.author: Steve \

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: Got to be worse design and screen ever made I got 2 within 3 days both screens were cracked sent to store they were out of screens due to mass breaking should do a massive recall or free upgrade on this one very disappointed with lg on this
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good phone
customer_reviews.text: I am a technology skeptic. I do not believe any hype. This phone exceeded my expectations for performance, ease of use, battery life and functionality. I highly recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: great phone!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: needed a new phone and this one fit the bill. love the fact that the processor is faster than the s3
customer_reviews.author: cmack

customer_reviews.title: This phone is a great phone!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a must have. I like everything about it. I have no complaints. I did a full research before buying it. And i have to say its better than the current htc and Samsung phones besides the Note2.
customer_reviews.author: Alva

customer_reviews.title: great phone but not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: this phone still had some lag and the keyboard was just not easy to get used to. If speed is a concern, I would go with something like the HTC One
customer_reviews.author: truReView

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone! ....very thin ...light weight ...Functional! Replaced my HTC Evo Shift with the LG Optimus G and am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: sissi

customer_reviews.title: The LG Optimus G is an OK phone.
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice if the Optimus G could transfer and/or accept transfers of the people in our "contacts" list. My old phone is completely dead so I've lost everything and Sprint no longer keeps a copy that they can download onto a replacement or new phone. Other than that, the features are good, including Kindle.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

product_meta.title: LG Optimus G, Black 32GB (Sprint)
product_meta.description:
The LG Optimus G boasts a Quad Core processor, which offers enhanced device performance while you multitask, improved image processing and increased application responses. The device runs on Android 4.0, Ice Cream Sandwich. Enjoy smooth multitasking, customizable home screens, resizable widgets, and new ways of communicating and sharing. LG Optimus G incorporates a 4.7-inch WXGA touch screen, a super bright display and includes useful technology such as NFC with Google Wallet, enhanced video conferencing and HD Voice.

AMAZON.COM




Wireless speeds up to 10 times faster than today's 3G from any other national wireless carrier (view larger). 

13 megapixel camera (view larger). LG OPTIMUS
AT A GLANCE:

 * 4G LTE connectivity
   
   
 * Android v4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich)
   
   
 * 1.5 GHz quad-core processor
   
   
 * Ultra Bright 4.7-inch true HD IPS WXGA
   
   
 * Dual cameras - 13 megapixels rear-facing, 1.3 front-facing
   
   
 * 32 GB ROM, two GB RAM
   
   
 * NFC technology
   
   
 * 2100 mAh battery
   
   

The LG Optimus G boasts a Quad Core processor, which offers enhanced device performance while you multitask, improved image processing and increased application responses. The device runs on Android 4.0, Ice Cream Sandwich. Enjoy smooth multitasking, customizable home screens, resizable widgets, and new ways of communicating and sharing. LG Optimus G incorporates a 4.7-inch WXGA touch screen, a super bright display and includes useful technology such as NFC with Google Wallet, enhanced video conferencing and HD Voice.

HIGH-QUALITY PHOTOS AND VIDEO
You can leave your camera at home and use the powerful 13 megapixel camera, more powerful than many digital cameras. The dual cameras are perfect for capturing all your memories and making face-to-face video chat easy. The LG Optimus G also has 1080p full HD recording, uploading and playback.

PROFESSIONAL GRADE
This device comes standard with Sprint Professional Grade features such as enhanced security, device management and Exchange Active Sync/PIM capabilities.

SMARTPHONE FEATURES
The LG Optimus G includes all the advanced features you’ve come to expect from your smartphone like Bluetooth, Google Apps synchronization and a full HTML browser. Your phone can also become a 3G/4G LTE mobile HotSpot with 802.11 b/g/n Wi-Fi. Also included is full Google integration, giving you access to turn-by-turn directions with Google Maps. Stay connected with Gmail and GTalk, watch all the latest YouTube videos on the go and schedule all your meetings on Google Calendar.

WHAT’S IN THE BOX
LG Optimus G handset; Standard battery (embedded); Charger; Two NFC tags; Important information booklet including Terms and Conditions of Service and Safety and Warranty Information; Getting Started Guide English; Getting Started Guide Spanish; Recycle bag

VITAL STATISTICS
The LG Optimus G measures 5.19 x 2.71 x .33 inches and weighs 5.11 ounces.






ANDROID ICE CREAM SANDWICH OPERATING SYSTEM
This phone runs the Android 4.0.4 operating system (dubbed Ice Cream Sandwich), which adds powerful new ways of communicating and sharing while improving on the best Android features: easy multitasking, rich notifications, customizable home screens, resizable widgets, and more.

The updated Ice Cream Sandwich interface features an onscreen navigation bar that replaces the hardware buttons for Back, Home, and Menu found with older Android-powered phones. And with Google+ integration, you can video chat with groups of up to 9 friends as well as easily upload and share photos and videos. Other features include:

Face Unlock
You can now unlock your phone with just your face using the Face Unlock option. It takes advantage of the front-facing camera and state-of-the-art facial recognition technology to register a face during setup and then to recognize it again when unlocking the device. Just hold your phone in front of your face to unlock (or use a backup PIN).

And the lock screen now lets you do more without unlocking. From the slide lock screen, you can jump directly to the camera for a picture or pull down the notifications window to check for messages. When listening to music, you can even manage music tracks and see album art.

Home Screen Folders
Quickly access related apps right from the home screen by organizing apps and shortcuts into folders--just drag one app onto another to create a folder.

Multitasking
Multitasking is even easier and more visual in Android 4.0.4. The Recent Apps button lets you jump instantly from one task to another using the list in the System Bar. The list pops up to show thumbnail images of apps used recently--tapping a thumbnail switches to the app.

Voice Input
The new voice engine in Android 4.0.4 lets you dictate the text you want, for as long as you want, using the language you want. You can speak continuously for a prolonged time, even pausing for intervals if needed, and dictate punctuation to create correct sentences. As the voice input engine enters text, it underlines possible dictation errors in gray. After dictating, you can tap the underlined words to quickly replace them from a list of suggestions.

ANDROID 4.0.4 FEATURES
 * Global roaming in 220 countries
 * Direct access from the lock screen to phone, camera, and text
 * New home screen layout with enhanced launch bar
 * Improved voice input: hold down the search key to dictate emails and text or navigate to an address
 * Face unlock: the device uses the front-facing camera to automatically recognize you when you attempt to unlock
 * Data usage: the new usage center allows you to monitor how much data is consumed each month
 * Android Market for browsing and downloading thousands of free and paid apps 
 * Pre-loaded Android apps: Browser, Calculator, Calendar (Google or Corporate), Camera, Clock, Contacts, Email, Gallery, Messaging, Music, News & Weather, Phone, Settings, Video Player, Voice Dialer, Voice Search, YouTube 
 * Google applications: Gmail, Google Search, Google Voice Search, Google Latitude, Google Maps, Google Places, Google Talk 
 * Google Maps Navigation with spoken turn-by-turn directions showing real-time traffic and 360° views of the destination 






CONNECTIVITY
 * Ultra-fast 4G LTE connectivity 
 * Wireless Wi-Fi networking (802.11b/g/n) for accessing home and corporate networks 
 * Built-in mobile hotspot functionality allows Wi-Fi enabled devices to share the 3G or 4G experience on the go with a laptop, camera, music player, game unit, video player, or any other Wi-Fi enabled device. 
 * Near Field Communication (NFC) for sharing contacts, web pages, directions, and more to compatible phones 
 * GPS for navigation for access to turn-by-turn directions with Google Maps 

HARDWARE
 * 1.5 GHz Quad-Core processor allowing you to quickly switch between apps, enjoy HD gaming and super-fast web browsing 
 * 4.7-inch WXGA Touch Screen 

COMMUNICATIONS & INTERNET
 * Web browser with full HTML browser and Google Search
 * Text (SMS) and picture/video (MMS) messaging 
 * Personal and work e-mail 

CAMERA
 * Rear-facing camera 13 megapixels with LED flash
 * Front-facing camera with 1.3 megapixels for video chats and self portraits 

MEMORY
 * RAM two GB 
 * ROM 32 GB






ALSO AVAILABLE FOR THIS ANDROID DEVICE
Amazon Appstore for Android
Get a great paid app for free every day.

Kindle
Buy a book once and read it everywhere with our free Kindle Reading App for Android.

Amazon MP3
Shop 15 million songs and stream your Cloud Drive music directly from your Android device.

IMDB
Find local movie showtimes and TV listings, watch trailers, and search the world's largest source of entertainment information.

Audible
Download audiobooks directly to your Android device, then listen wherever you go, get audiobook news, earn badges, and more.

Amazon Mobile
Shop for millions of products, get product details, and read reviews--right from your mobile device.
